resource.name: Dangerous Buildings Scored
resource.description: As of late 2010, all open Dangerous Building cases are scored by inspectors according to several objective criteria, including age of the case, severity of the damage to the structure, proximity to parks, schools, and major streets, and likelihood of being repaired. If you have questions about the score for a particular case, please contact the inspector responsible for monitoring the case, by calling 816-513-8430.

resource.name: Lane Miles Paved By Fiscal Year - Annual Totals
resource.description: The number of lane miles paved is a simple indicator of the amount of investment the City is making in the driving surface of our roads. The unit lane miles differs from a traditional mile of street because a one mile stretch of roadway that is made up of two northbound and two southbound lanes would actually be four total lane miles.  The City of Kansas City is charged with maintaining more than 6,000 lane miles of street.
columns_description: Miles of road lanes that were resurfaced.

resource.name: City Claim Activity - Workers Compensation
resource.description: The City Claim Activity table shows the total expected cost related to injuries and illnesses that occurred during each year.  The expected cost can be paid out over any number of years and includes actual costs plus estimated future costs based on injury type, temporary or permanent disability, and litigation status.

resource.name: Justine PETERSEN Microloans
resource.description:
Number and dollar amount of microloans by month.

Justine Petersen Small Business Microloans

Justine Petersen is the nation's largest U.S. Small Business Administration microlending program, which began lending in the Kansas City region in 2012. The goal of the program is to provide access to basic financing for small businesses, both start-up and existing, that might otherwise face barriers when seeking funding from mainstream financial institutions. You can learn more about Justine Peterson by visiting their website.
